reporter_caption.center: NEW YORK CITY PROP. MGT., LLC v. SANTOS, 32 Misc.3d 1214 (2011)

caption.center: New York City Prop. Mgt., LLC v. Santos.

court.center: Civil Court of the City of New York.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgments — Res Judicata — Petitioner was precluded from introducing evidence at trial to challenge validity of lease assumed in bankruptcy proceeding.
